text: after the end of the arab-israel war

it have also practical functions such as

experts are baffled as to who built the

something roughly that shape they've

they've built it using gigantic stones

Yonatan maserati has spent three years
excavating the mysterious ruins the
layout of the site makes my's Rocchi
suspect the mysterious ancient builders
could have used this as an elaborate

see here the actual entrance to the

again at the circular layout some
archeologists disagree with the burial
Theory instead they see similarities

could track the passing of time
the Northeast gate is due to the

Maserati has discovered that the size of

the central Mound
this suggests they come from different
